factions.name: Royal Court of Castile
factions.description: The inner circle loyal to Juan II. Centered around Álvaro de Luna and the king's personal appointees. Includes the royal guard, key officials, and the newly formed advisory cabinet.

factions.name: Faction of the Infantes de Aragón
factions.description: Coalition of nobles allied with the Infantes Juan and Enrique de Aragón. They seek to control Castilian governance through a noble council, limiting royal authority and Álvaro de Luna's influence. Commands ~25% of Castile's military power through 8-10 major noble houses.
